text: FC UTA Arad, commonly known as UTA Arad, is a football club from Arad, Romania. The club is the fifth most successful in Romania, behind FCSB, FC Dinamo București, CFR Cluj and Venus București. ==Honours== ===Domestic=== Liga I :*Winners (6): 1946–47, 1947–48, 1950, 1954, 1968–69, 1969–70 :*Runners-up (1): 1971–72 Cupa României :*Winners (2): 1947–48, 1953 :*Runners-up (2): 1950, 1966 Liga II :*Winners (3): 1980–81, 1992–93, 2001–02 :*Runners-up (5): 1982–83,1988–89, 1989–90, 1991–92, 1998–99 ===European=== UEFA Cup: * Best result: Quarter-Finalist: 1971–72 Category:Romanian football clubs Category:1945 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in Romania
title: UTA Arad
